text: Hong Kong competed at the 1968 Summer Olympics in Mexico City, Mexico. Eleven competitors, all men, took part in twelve events in three sports. ==Sailing== ;Open {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan=7|Race
